text: Twink Caplan (born 25 December 1947) is an American actress. She played Rona in the first two Look Who's Talking movies. She also played Miss Geist in the 1995 movie Clueless. The actress was born in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. ==References== Category:Actors from Pittsburgh Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1947 births Category:Living people
title: Twink Caplan
